title: Run endorsement path through web operator harness with Claude Haiku 4.5 — evaluate speed, cost, and accuracy against a test activity (Echerd - remove Honda Civic). Log run artifacts and compare.

Investigate missing test cases — Dry Ridge Farm (correct example) and Bill Kistler (error case) from MaeLena's guide are not in the activity list. May have been consumed by Rudra's testing. Check with Rudra or ask George to request more from MaeLena.

Monday demo dry run — full end-to-end execution on a saved activity (Thanh Tran - add Lexus or Wong/Huang - coverage change) with the validated path and chosen model. Must complete successfully before the call.

Shake out endorsement path with Claude Code — manually walk through Steps 1-5 against Fergerson activity (remove Ford F150) using agent-browser. Verify each step works. Stop before Step 6 (premium) to preserve the activity. Document any path refinements needed.
notes: Steps 1-4 verified working. Step 5 blocked: 2024-2025 BAUT policy not in Policies sidebar. See artifact 2026-02-19-endorsement-path-shakeout.md. Password ! escaping bug found — needs eval workaround.

title: Refine endorsement path based on shakeout findings — update path_v1.md with any corrections to selectors, navigation, timing, or step instructions discovered during manual walkthrough

Benchmark additional models if Haiku results are insufficient — test Sonnet 4.6 and/or open source browser-use models. Use comparison framework (src/framework/comparison.py) for side-by-side evaluation.
